name: date-fns-example-cdn
description: Example of date-fns usage with CDN versions
author: Sasha Koss <koss@nocorp.me>

scripts.build: rm -rf node_modules/date-fns && mkdir -p node_modules && cp -r ../../lib node_modules/date-fns || npm run build-date-fns
scripts.test: npm run test-basic && npm run test-fp && npm run test-locale && npm run test-locales
